comment: Its incredible how just a few decades changes the course of lifetimes. Margot couldnt marry a divorced man but Charles could and now Prince Harry can. Its really eyeopening to history.
amr:
# ::snt Its incredible how just a few decades changes the course of lifetimes. Margot couldnt marry a divorced man but Charles could and now Prince Harry can. Its really eyeopening to history.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / incredible
            :domain (t / thing
                  :manner-of (c / change-01
                        :ARG0 (f / few
                              :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (d / decade))
                              :mod (j / just))
                        :ARG1 (c2 / course
                              :poss (l / lifetime)))))
      :snt2 (c3 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (m2 / marry-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Margot"))
                        :ARG2 (m3 / man
                              :ARG0-of (d2 / divorce-01))))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (p3 / possible-01
                        :ARG1 (m4 / marry-01
                              :ARG1 (p4 / person
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Charles"))
                              :ARG2 (m5 / man
                                    :ARG1-of d2))))
            :op2 (p5 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (m6 / marry-01
                        :ARG1 (p6 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Prince"
                                    :op2 "Harry"))
                        :time (n4 / now))))
      :snt3 (o / open-01
            :ARG1 (h / history)
            :degree (r / really)))

comment: Never knew much about her until The Crown. See what we can learn from TV?
